CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1962, page 3, reads: "Aim..."The Pittsburgh Story" - The special committee of the Western Pennsylvania Research and Historical Society, which is engaged in assisting in writing of "The Pittsburgh Story," slated to appear in the Feb. 24 Courier, are (left to right, seated) Mrs. Eloise Thompson, Mrs. W. Roderick Brown, Samuel Golden (president), Mrs. John W. Wilson and (standing) John W. Wilson and Walter Worthington. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Western Pennsylvania Research and Historical Society committee, seated from left: Eloise Thompson, Mrs. W. Roderick Brown, Samuel Golden, and Mrs. John W. Wilson; standing: John W. Wilson and Walter Worthington, gathered around table with documents, in church
